item.title: Need help fast
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:2, topic:230101”]Ok, just edit the text in between the brackets. Heres an example,

[quote]case 2677:

clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Close Window”, 6967);//Close Text
sendQuest(“TESTTESTTEST”, 6968);//Line 1
sendQuest(“Click the crate”, 6969);//Line 2
sendQuest(“Search karamja for a fireplace”, 6970);//Line 3
sendQuest(“Use this scroll on it”, 6971);//Line 4
sendQuest("", 6972);//Line 5
sendQuest("", 6973);//Line 6
sendQuest("", 6974);//Line 7
sendQuest("", 6975);//Line 8
showInterface(6965);
flushOutStream();
break;
}[/quote][/quote]WTF? you’re always too fast PE :[

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fast
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Ok, just edit the text in between the brackets. Heres an example,

case 2677:

clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Close Window”, 6967);//Close Text
sendQuest(“TESTTESTTEST”, 6968);//Line 1
sendQuest(“Click the crate”, 6969);//Line 2
sendQuest(“Search karamja for a fireplace”, 6970);//Line 3
sendQuest(“Use this scroll on it”, 6971);//Line 4
sendQuest("", 6972);//Line 5
sendQuest("", 6973);//Line 6
sendQuest("", 6974);//Line 7
sendQuest("", 6975);//Line 8
showInterface(6965);
flushOutStream();
break;
}

item.title: Need help fast
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

i want to make it so that when you click the clue scroll it opens and shows the directions. this is what i have tell me what to do please…

[code]case 2677:

clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Close Window”, 6967);//Close Text
sendQuest(“Go to crates in yanille dining room”, 6968);//Line 1
sendQuest(“Click the crate”, 6969);//Line 2
sendQuest(“Search karamja for a fireplace”, 6970);//Line 3
sendQuest(“Use this scroll on it”, 6971);//Line 4
sendQuest("", 6972);//Line 5
sendQuest("", 6973);//Line 6
sendQuest("", 6974);//Line 7
sendQuest("", 6975);//Line 8
showInterface(6965);
flushOutStream();
break;
}[/code]
